name: DECON Co.
description:
Submission for Mini Jam 32: Explosions

Welcome to DECON Co. The only truly budget deconstruction company

You're job is to destroy the remaining building materials left on site with comically large explosives.

What will be the fate of your company? I don't know. I haven't made the rest.

Controls:

Left click: Bring out a bomb

Right click: Poorly implemented dab.

Scroll Forward: Throw bomb forward

Scroll Down: Throw bomb down

WASD/Up down left right: Move

Notes:

  • Your time is shown at the end of the game once everything is destroyed. 
  • Throwing bombs down multiple times is pretty fun
  • Yes, throwing bombs down is supposed to be a jump. It's just not a very good jump.
